Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Blackstone

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Howard.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
